What are the treatments for fumarase deficiency ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of fumarase deficiency:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Fumarate Hydratase Deficiency  - Genetic Testing Registry: Fumarase deficiency   These resources from MedlinePlus offer information about the diagnosis and management of various health conditions:  - Diagnostic Tests  - Drug Therapy  - Surgery and Rehabilitation  - Genetic Counseling   - Palliative
